title: WTB These three H.M. Taylor Detroit Tiger postcards
author: T206Jim

posts.post_title: WTB These three H.M. Taylor Detroit Tiger postcards
posts.post_content:
I am looking to purchase or trade for the following three H.M. Taylor postcards:

"Wild" Bill Donovan
Bill Coughlin
Floral Horseshoe presented to Bill Donovan.

Any help in acquiring these postcards in any condition would be greatly appreciated!
